ai-patthana8.2:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.2:1.1_0: only for the sake of teaching ...
ai-patthana8.2:1.1_1: There are two great primary elements that are produced by the great elementals and forms, namely form derived from the great earth.
ai-patthana8.2:1.1_2: One doesn’t give rise to the cause, for the sake of thoughts, or for the sake of doubt, nor for the sake of the aggregates of delusion.
ai-patthana8.2:1.1_3: and the formations of the aggregates.
ai-patthana8.2:1.1_4: Not cause or reason, without cause,
ai-patthana8.2:3.1_0: Not for the sake of reason or for the sake of teaching,
ai-patthana8.2:3.1_1: Not cause or reason, without teaching,
ai-patthana8.2:3.1_2: Thoughts that are without cause or reason, without a cause or reason, because of cause or reason,
ai-patthana8.2:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.2:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
ai-patthana8.2:5.1_0: You should go to the same place as a collection of the same sleeping place and embracing the same way.
ai-patthana8.2:6.1_0: Not because of the sake of the Dhamma, for the sake of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana8.2:6.1_1: Not because of the cause or condition, not by the reason for the sake of nature,
ai-patthana8.2:6.1_2: It is not the reason why, not for the sake of teaching, nor for the sake of all the Dhamma, or for the sake of natural principles, and for the sake of (of the teaching).
ai-patthana8.2:7.1_0: not the cause or condition for the sake of teaching ...
ai-patthana8.2:9.1_0: Ninely there are nine projects nine grounds ...
ai-patthana8.2:9.1_1: when the six classes of rebirth can be produced. Ninely, when his body breaks up, after death, he was reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-patthana8.2:9.1_2: the four paths associated with the three primary elements ...
ai-patthana8.2:10.1_0: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
